movie.title: Evilspeak
movie.description_intro: An outcast military cadet taps into a way to summon demons and cast spells on his tormentors through his computer.
movie.description_full: An outcast military cadet taps into a way to summon demons and cast spells on his tormentors through his computer.

movies.title: Sr. Pig
movies.summary: A kind, broke and dying man , whose best pal is a beautiful pig named Howard , needs to find him a new loving home before he dies. He has what he thinks is the solution in Mexico and drives there with Howard only to see he will be horribly mistreated like all the other pigs waiting to be slaughtered. A great lesson in the sentience of animals, human connection and humanity.

movies.title: Edging
movies.summary: EDGING is a chamber dramedy about the brink of adulthood and how quickly it comes.
movies.description_full: EDGING is a chamber dramedy about the brink of adulthood and how quickly it comes.
movies.synopsis: EDGING is a chamber dramedy about the brink of adulthood and how quickly it comes.

movies.title: Mountain Patrol
movies.summary: The Tibetan Mountain Patrol, a self-sponsored outcast regimen established to eliminate illegal slaughtering of endangered Tibetan Antelopes by impoverished local and out-of-province peasants, intimately engages with a half-Tibetan journalist from Beijing in a desolate depiction of human nature in the outskirts of Kekexili.

movies.title: Kissing Jessica Stein
movies.summary: Jessica Stein is a single, straight, successful, journalist, part of a bonded Jewish family living in New York City, who finds herself not as straight as she thought when Jessica meets and begins an intense friendship with career woman Helen Cooper which ultimately leads to romance.
movies.description_full: Jessica Stein is a single, straight, successful, journalist, part of a bonded Jewish family living in New York City, who finds herself not as straight as she thought when Jessica meets and begins an intense friendship with career woman Helen Cooper which ultimately leads to romance.
